website_summaries.verdict: This durable boys' bike cruises down your sidewalk just as effortlessly as it does the boardwalk.
pros: Whitewall balloon tires for a cushioned ride
Oversize seat with dual springs for added comfort
Tires work well on roads, sidewalks, dirt, and sand
cons: Rear axle is a little short for training wheels, but they can be added with modifications

customer_reviews.title: super-nice kids bike
customer_reviews.text: It is a great bike. so much nicer than the WM / T /Dept store-type bikes. Cruiser design is so nice. Everything is sturdy with quality features and good materials (aluminum alloy rims...), and it was VERY easy to put together. comes mostly assembled. If you will need training wheels, be sure to get ones with a thin/single connector piece, as the axle is not very long. a little more rear axle length would be a nice feature. the training wheels i ordered used thick, double plates, and the birthday was coming up, so i had to buy a new rear wheel with a slightly longer axle at the last minute, but no bog deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jainvegan

customer_reviews.title: Quality cute bike
customer_reviews.text: Cutest bike ever. My son loves it! Great quality and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Good Bike - Missing Seat.
customer_reviews.text: Bike was easy to install but was missing seat Had to improvise by removing seat from another bike so I would not have an upset 5 year old on Christmas day. We contacted company but have no heard back on getting a seat for the bike. The only other tip I have is if installing training wheels need to invert rear fender screws so they are flush.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita R. Jerden

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 9 year old, but next year he will out grow it i think..
customer_reviews.author: summer chilcote

customer_reviews.title: Lot of time spent , and cussing , to statt
customer_reviews.text: First. I will finish the review , after the assembly. The instruction book is TERRIBLE. It combines several models in one , maze of you take a guess ? . the front fender, as this one " California crusier. Has one . the book shows nothing . putting on a fender is not rocket science. However when you have the guessing game of , what screw ? What location ? Try this ? No . the tire is rubbing . a second grader , probably designed this worthless book .
customer_reviews.author: J.  Phillips.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and also easy to handle. My son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great beach bike!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike! Got it for my sons 8th birthday and he was thrilled! Took him to the beach on it and everyone is asking where we got it! Solid frame, easily assembled, looks rad!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Cruiser
customer_reviews.text: The Urban Boy is a great little cruiser. My son wanted something to match my Urban Man cruiser, and this was perfect. We keep it at the beach and have great fun cruising all around. With the fenders, my son especially likes seeking out the big puddles to ride through. I think the bike looks great - he probably perfers the looks of his other BMX-type bike more, but he cannot wait to get on it everytime we get to the beach. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: AB NC

customer_reviews.title: Stylie Beach Cruiser
customer_reviews.text: We bought both 20" beach cruisers the white with pink rims and the black with red rims. One for our 7 year old daughter and one for our 5 year old son. Sweet rides, looks stylie, easy assembly. Needs a custom hard rack! Only bummer is the basket we bought for the bike was too big.
customer_reviews.author: shaunna marcum

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Be Happier!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous about purchasing such a large and expensive item online. Especially since it was an x-mas present for my son. To my pleasant suprise I had absolutley no issues. The bike arrived very quickly and in good shape. My husband had no issues putting it together. I don't think a day has gone by since x-mas that my son hasn't ridden his bike. All his friends want to know where he got it so we earned extra cool points.
customer_reviews.author: Reader1.0

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is stylish and reasonably priced. We thought the quality was so great we purchased a second one! Assembly wasn't to bad. It only took about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: MontanaE

product_meta.title: Firmstrong Boys 20" Beach Cruiser Bicycle Urban Boy Single Speed (1sp)
product_meta.description: A great introduction to riding in style, the 20-inch single-speed Urban Boy cruiser bike from Firmstrong is ideal for both children just learning to ride as well as those who have graduated from training wheels. It features 20-inch wheels as well as front and rear fenders, and training wheels (sold separately) can be attached to the bike. The coaster brake stops by pedaling backwards, which is an easy and safe way for children to learn to ride. Sized for young riders from 3 feet, 2-inches to 4 feet, 4-inches tall, it's a great choice for many riding environments -- by the beach or anywhere else on a paved path. The Urban Boy is designed just like Firmstrong' s bikes for older riders with a classic, curvy cruiser design and a durable 13-inch steel frame. The 20-inch aluminum wheels feature 2.125-inch wide white-wall balloon tires that roll smooth and easy as well as cushion the bumps as you ride over them freely. The wide, oversized cruiser seat completes your comfort with dual springs that help make the ride soft and cushy. Both the seat and the handlebars can be adjusted to properly fit the rider. It also features a chain guard to protect pant, and wide cruiser bike handlebars with rubber grips. The bike is shipped 80 percent assembled. Firmstrong has been designing high quality, affordable bikes for over 10 years with a focus on blending style and functionality to create a fun, adventurous experience for riders -- not just a mode of transportation.
feature_bullets: 20-inch boy's single-speed cruiser bike great for introduction to relaxed riding
Pedal-backwards coaster brake for easy pedaling and smooth braking
White-wall balloon tires for a cushioned ride; front and rear fenders
Oversized seat with dual springs for added comfort
13-inch frame sized for young riders from 3 feet, 2 inches to 4 feet, 4 inches tall
